summary.description:
A MATLAB-based slicing algorithm to enable 3D-printing of tissue engineering scaffolds with heterogeneous porous microarchitecture.

version 1.0.2 (15.4 MB) by Ethan Nyberg.

Prepares GCODE files to 3D-Print Porous Shapes.

Choose a web site to get translated content where available and see local events and offers. Based on your location, we recommend that you select:
summary.name: scafSLICR
